title: Closing the Loop: Recycling of MAPbI3 Perovskite Solar Cells

Closed-loop recycling is crucial in the rapidly expanding era of photovoltaic deployment. Yet, the recycling of commercial silicon photovoltaic modules presents challenges due to laborious component separation. In contrast, layers...
